=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BVENDANO 10×10gm Face Paint Kit One Stroke Split Cake Water Based Palette with 3 Professional Brushes Body Paint Makeup Birthday Party Halloween
Review Date: 2021/07/10
Store: Bvendano
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Bvendano', 'Item Form': 'Palette', 'Package Information': 'Palette', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '10.28 x 3.66 x 0.94 inches; 12.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '725188865783 725188146394 725188832396'}
Review Text: With this kit you get more than just face paint painting cakes, you also get 3 professional brushes. I like the fact that each one of the cakes has three colors in it. The one drawback I find with this kit is that the three colors in each cake can sometimes affects you do not want, be careful not to get a color you do not want while trying to get one color out of the cakes that have three colors in it. Thank you, God bless, you and may the rest of your life be the best your life.  OZ
Review Title: More than just a face painting kit
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
### Updated User Profile Summary

**Interests:**
- Creative expression through face and body painting, nail art, and engaging in family-oriented activities that cater to all ages.
- Enjoyment of themed events, particularly Halloween festivities, with a growing interest in versatile beauty tools.
- Recent exploration of skincare tools and nail care products for enhanced personal grooming and creative styling.

**Preferences:**
- Values non-toxic, user-friendly products that ensure safety and health in creative pursuits. 
- Appreciates versatility in colors and designs, emphasizing artistic adaptability in both makeup and nail art.
- Favors Afrocentric styles and fashion that promote individuality and personal expression.
- Highlights the significance of effective beauty tools for DIY projects and personal care, particularly in makeup and nail art, reflecting a commitment to quality and functionality.

**Behavior Patterns:**
- Engages positively with products that support fun, creativity, and quick transformations, particularly in cosmetics and body painting.
- Likely to participate in community-driven artistic activities, as evidenced by thoughtful product reviews and an affinity for versatile supplies.
- Values culturally significant items that facilitate easy styling and customization in design.
- Actively seeks advanced painting tools and professional-grade items, showcasing a dedication to self-expression in elaborate designs and an enhancement of overall creative projects. Recent experiences indicate an increased enthusiasm for high-quality products that empower effortless creativity.
